channel.title: Summer Jams Pt 1 & 2 (Draft, Fusion, Neo-Soul, Jazz, Hip-Hop)
channel.description:
Another WIP retro Summer jam.
'Part 2' started as a spin-off of another of my (as-yet-uncompleted) Summer Jams. So, I'll likely finish them as Parts 1 and 2 and bookend them on an Summer Jams EP.
Part 1 (Draft): https://soundcloud.com/heathenaka/nt-draft-jazzy-03-pt1/s-796cK
Part 2 (Draft): https://soundcloud.com/heathenaka/nt-draft-jazzy-03-pt2/s-5aT0o
  My process for these pieces is based around trialing things on a keyboard, then getting it down in Auxy. I think the fluidity of the melodies really benefits. Really able to feel the vibe when I'm creating. I feel much more connected to the music I'm making – and I think it shows in the music.
Enjoy. :sun_with_face:

item.title: Summer Jams Pt 1 & 2 (Draft, Fusion, Neo-Soul, Jazz, Hip-Hop)
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Another WIP retro Summer jam.

‘Part 2’ started as a spin-off of another of my (as-yet-uncompleted) Summer Jams.
So, I’ll likely finish them as Parts 1 and 2 and bookend them on an Summer Jams EP.

Part 1 (Draft):
https://soundcloud.com/heathenaka/nt-draft-jazzy-03-pt1/s-796cK

Part 2 (Draft):
https://soundcloud.com/heathenaka/nt-draft-jazzy-03-pt2/s-5aT0o

 
My process for these pieces is based around trialing things on a keyboard, then getting it down in Auxy.
I think the fluidity of the melodies really benefits. Really able to feel the vibe when I’m creating. I feel much more connected to the music I’m making – and I think it shows in the music.

Enjoy.
